title: Online Video Rental
description: A full-stack web application for managing a video club chain, built with Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and Docker. Users can browse movies, purchase them, track their watching status, and write reviews.

title: Web-GCS for ArduPilot SITL
description: This project is a web-based application designed to act as a simple Ground Control Station (GCS) for controlling ArduPilot vehicles running in the Software-In-The-Loop (SITL) simulator. It provides a user-friendly interface accessible from a web browser to monitor telemetry and send basic commands locally.

title: PicAPark
description: A mobile application that allows users to find and book parking spots in their area. It features a user-friendly interface and real-time availability updates.

title: Plastic Swap
description: An app that was supposed to act as a plastic wholesale market for new and recycled plastic.
